page.title: 08LEAVERS' EVENING IN G'M
page.content: Every June the fourth years at the primary school in Gilmorton have a Leavers' Evening.This involves the children who are leaving the school to go on to secondary education,their parents and the staff of the school.The school choir sings,the children play their recorders and this year the children talked about their week's field-trip to Scarborough. Each child is presented with a book by the Rector of Gilmorton who is also chairman of the school governors.The evening finishes with coffee and cakes. It is always a happy and interesting occasion and provides a fitting ending to the children's career at their primary school.
